Time outs are also often used without letting the child know how they’re getting out of the time out, which can make it feel arbitrary or like a punishment, rather than a consequence for something they did.  It’s really easy for adults to do this kind of thing unconsciously.  It’s easy to get caught up in the notion that “They’re in time out, and that’s the end of it!” but kids can be pretty imaginative, and they can use their own creativity to make their way out of time outs.  A compassionate time out ends when the child shows a sign of understanding what they’ve done wrong, and are ready to begin again.  That way the child knows they’re learning, and that the parent is seeing them as an intelligent person, even if they sometimes mess up.  You can still use the other techniques you were using to be tough when necessary, but using a compassionate approach will let you use them without actually using them!

prompt: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Lativian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Siļķe Kažokā?
chosen:
Of course. Latvian cuisine is famous for having an emphasis on using locally-grown ingredients, with plenty of soups and rich desserts made from dairy products. There’s also a regional emphasis on hearty salads and drinks.  The Siļķe Kažokā is a fairly light lunch dish, typically made from potatoes and chicken broth.  It’s usually served with ground black pepper on the side.  Here’s a recipe that shows the dish in a simpler form, with lots of local ingredients:

Ingredients:

1kg potatoes
2 small chickens, including the hearts and gizzards
1 litre of water
500 grams of frozen peas
2 chicken livers, chopped
100 grams of dark chicken meat, chopped
100 grams of shredded cheese
4 large onion slices
4 dill sprigs, chopped
Salt and pepper to taste

To make the stock: Place potatoes, chicken hearts and gizzards, water and salt in a pot.  Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 3 hours or more, depending on how tender you want the potatoes.

Once potatoes are cooked, drain the chicken broth into another pot and add the chicken meat and water to the potato pot.  Season the chicken meat, potato and broth mixture to taste with salt and pepper.  The more salt you use, the tastier the final dish will be.

Add the remaining ingredients and simmer for about 10 minutes to combine the flavors.

Picante de Pollo

2 pounds (1 kg) of chicken breast

1⁄2 cup (120 ml) vegetable oil

4 cloves garlic, finely chopped

1 onion, finely chopped

3 pounds (1.3 kg) of tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped

1 teaspoon (5 ml) pepper

1⁄2 teaspoon (2.5 ml) hot pepper

1 teaspoon (5 ml) salt

Chili powder

1 can (15 ounces; 420 g) of pinto beans

1 cup (250 ml) of water

Salt and pepper to taste

In a large skillet, heat the oil. Add the garlic and onion, and sauté for 4 to 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes and seasonings. Simmer until the tomatoes are well cooked and have reduced in size.

Place the chicken in a medium pot. Add the tomato mixture. Cook the mixture on low heat for 5 minutes. Stir, then add beans. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.

Serve with white rice and a garden salad.

If you want to speed up the growth of peppers in hot weather you can water them a lot, or even give them a little fertilizer. prompt: Can I make my own garden fertilizer from food scraps?
chosen: Sure, but it can take a little experimenting to get the right balance of ingredients to make compost, and you have to use enough to get the process started and to build the microbial life in the soil that’s necessary to break down the waste. For example, you want to use “greens” for the first stage of the compost pile and “browns” for the second stage. So basically, you’ll want to layer green food scraps from things like lettuce, cauliflower, green apples, etc. in the first layer of your compost pile, then cover it with a layer of brown stuff, like dryer lint or dry leaves.  When you do this, a soil microbe called a “predatory mite” will make the first stage of the compost pile grow. This “predatory mite” feeds on the life in the soil and is the start of the decomposition of the food waste. In order for your compost to turn into actual “soil” with all the nutrients in it that you want, you need to get to a second stage of composting with the “browns” where bacteria, fungi, and other microbes are present in the soil.

prompt: What does ad hominem mean?

“Ad hominem” literally means “to the man”, and it means focusing on attacking the person instead of the argument they’re making.  Here are some other common ad hominem fallacies:


Begging the question: Fallacy where an argument proves what it’s trying to prove. For example, it’s false that we need to have a conversation about something in order to know whether we should have the conversation. You can only know whether we should have the conversation if we do it. This sort of logic only works with in order to.
Accident: Fallacy where the wrong argument is called an “accident”, like when the person who says he can’t be racist because he has black friends, when in fact the reason he can’t be racist is that he’s not actually racist.
Appeal to pity: Fallacy where someone calls for an emotional appeal instead of using rational argument. An example is when someone says “I don’t have any money to donate”, and someone else calls them out for not helping the poor.

The last step is to try to connect the language you’re learning with your first language, or with languages that you already know, and practice by conversing with others.  It’s important to communicate in a way that feels natural and expresses yourself as clearly as you can. Then I take a small bowl of water and put some eggs in it. You let them sit for five minutes, until the white of the egg floats up and goes down.

Then I peel the egg and cut the white into strips. The next step is I fry the egg whites in olive oil for a couple minutes on each side, until they become crispy.

prompt: What is the best way to clean a laptop screen?
chosen:
Some cleaners and other products will claim to clean the screen, but they may damage the screen. Here are some steps you can take to clean a screen that have been tested and are effective:

Dry off your screen with a soft cloth or with a clean cotton towel.

Do not use anything abrasive. You may have seen liquid cleaners, or wipes that claim to clean or refresh your laptop screen. These may leave scratches, causing you to think your screen is dirty and dirty again! If you try using these on your screen, you may damage your screen.

If you can, use a screen cleaner that is available at an office supply store. Avoid “solutions” that are advertised as a perfect cleaning solution or as “like a towel but 100 times better”.

Do not use a can of compressed air to clean the screen. Canned air is not an acceptable method for cleaning your screen. It may cause more damage to your screen by cleaning dust and debris.

Use the factory cleaners on your screen. Usually these are chemicals with a blue liquid inside a paper box. Make sure that it is made by your screen manufacturer and not a generic brand from the store. If your screen can be removed, gently clean it

prompt: Native American, or Indigenous tradition in the United States, sometimes focuses on the Buffalo as a sacred animal. I'm curious as to why, some themes about that?
chosen:
Native Americans have been hunters for many centuries.  Prior to European colonization, they often practiced subsistence hunting on land.  They did this by slowly tracking an animal, and using a special strategy of driving the animal off a cliff in order to kill it and obtain the meat.  This method of hunting was sustainable because they were careful not to hunt too many animals in one place.  They didn’t want to decrease their food sources too much, or they might end up getting sick.  

The buffalo are considered one of the most important animals in the story of Native American heritage.  The buffalo also holds some very significant spiritual connections to the Native Americans, they held spiritual importance due to the big role it played in the Native American’s day to day life.  The buffalo were important to Native Americans because they used them for meat, fur, hide, tools, etc.  But they also helped to find water in the drier times of the year.  The buffalo is also a vital tool to help Native Americans when they use the buffalo to obtain beads and other forms of trade with other tribes.

The reasons include a respect for tradition, a desire to separate themselves from colonial settlers, the possibility that non-Native American people might try to exploit Native American traditions for their own purposes, the realization that trying to explain their traditions to other people can be harmful, and so on. prompt: I like to host guests at my home from time to time, and I am gathering  recipes of different dishes and drinks to keep things interesting. I am interested in trying some Indonesian dishes. Can you give me a recipe for Soto Ayam?
chosen:
Sure! There are lots of similar preparations, all of which will feature some variations on the soup base: chicken, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Soto ayam is a clear chicken soup. Here’s a recipe you can use to make a version of it:


Ingredients: 
 1 whole chicken breast
 1 tablespoon chicken base
 3 cups of chicken broth
 2 tomatoes, diced
 1/2 onion, diced
 3/4 cup coconut milk (light or full fat)
 Salt to taste

Instructions:


1.    Chop the chicken into bite-sized pieces and put it into a large stockpot.


2.    Add the chicken base and the chicken broth, and bring it to a boil.


3.    While the stock is coming to a boil, dice the tomatoes.


4.    Once the stock has reached a rolling boil, add the diced tomatoes and the diced onion.  This mixture will make the “tomato stock” for the soup.


5.    Once the tomato stock is boiling, add the coconut milk.  The coconut milk will now be mixed in, but don’t worry, this is good!  There is still more to add!



6.    Add the diced chicken and stir gently so that all the chicken is submerged.  Once the chicken is fully submerged, it is done!


To make this into soto ayam, simply make a clear soup.  Once it has reached a boil, add about 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon of salt.  This will give it a sweet and sour taste, which is typical.  Add a bit more if you want to really make the soup taste salty, but I personally like to avoid this.  Garnish with sliced scallions and grated coconut.


Sorry it’s such a long process for a single recipe, but I wanted to make sure you’d get a flavorful and authentic version!  Let me know if you have any questions.
rejected:
Soto Ayam is a clear soup, served with chicken, tofu, or egg. It has rice vermicelli, hard-boiled egg, chilis and soy sauce, for example. 

Why don’t we start by you writing down what kinds of food and drinks you already like to offer at your home? We can look at what Indonesian cuisine offers that’s similar to the food you already make.

prompt: Is that allowed in Citrus Heights
chosen:
The California Department of Housing and Community Development (HCD) states that “Section 504 of the Fair Housing Amendments Act of 1988, the ADA, and related U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) rules, require that any dwelling unit built in or after the effective date of these laws be accessible to a person with a disability.”  
These laws apply to new homes, as well as dwelling units being reconstructed.   Citrus Heights does not have any particular code requirements for accessibility, but could be subject to lawsuits and therefore some municipalities are not allowed to exclude ADUs from zoning.   
In this case the Housing Division may require an ADU to be built in a particular location within the subdivision in order to meet the required zoning standards.
rejected: The Citrus Heights Municipal Code allows for ADUs on all properties, even commercial or industrial properties.  However, many Citrus Heights cities have their own zoning ordinances.   In the past the Citrus Heights Cities did have varying limits on the number of ADUs in a single property, but that was modified to allow for all zoning districts to allow ADUs.

Most miners would use applications on their computers or on servers that they run to do the work.  Computers in a mining “pool” can coordinate their efforts and combine the work of each of the individual miners.  The work is done by processing transactions.  Each time someone makes a payment from one address to another, the computer needs to make sure that they have the right to make the payment.  This requires checking that the sender has enough bitcoins in their wallet to make the payment, checking that the receiver has enough bitcoins in their wallet to receive it, and checking that they’re both paying the correct amount, and in the right direction, based on the addresses they’re using.  
If all that checks out, and a payment is allowed, then the receiver receives bitcoins into their wallet.  Then the sender’s wallet subtracts the amount paid.  The pools of miners collect a percentage of the fees paid by users of their pool, for processing each transaction.

prompt: Okay. Is it best to chat first for a while online, before meeting in person?
chosen: Absolutely.  It’s important to determine if there is compatibility in a variety of aspects beyond just what they are saying, but also how they’re saying it.  In my opinion, it is good to have a conversation over a period of time, with "non-date" conversations where you are not forced to come up with something to say, or worry about whether or not it is boring for the other person.  Sometimes it takes longer to have a conversation about life and love and personal values.  But, when it’s good, it’s really really good.
rejected: In my opinion, when meeting someone in person for the first time, it’s important to get the feel of what is going on.  If the two people don’t feel comfortable around each other, or aren’t in agreement about their relationship expectations, or if there is a lack of trust, I think it’s best to either not make plans to meet in person, or to meet in public so that the atmosphere is clearly not romantic and is focused on getting to know each other.  With time and practice, and in a more meaningful way, one can move into trusting a romantic relationship, or not.  My hope is that both parties are more likely to develop a loving relationship, if they are both willing to put effort into getting to know each other before feeling pressure to rush into a romantic relationship.  To that end, I think it is a good idea to meet the person you are talking to in person before going into a relationship with them, but it is not necessarily an indicator of whether or not the connection will be strong or good.

American omelets are usually made by breaking the egg directly into the frying pan. Once the dish has cooked for a while, you can flip it over, and continue cooking, like this:

[Image: “flipped-German-omelet”]

prompt: Are they causing any issues in the ecosystem?
chosen: Well the nutria have an extremely high reproductive rate, and they can reproduce even when they’re in captivity.  So, in the US, nutria are an invasive species.  While nutria themselves do not cause harm to the ecosystem, the high numbers of nutria (the US imported 20,000, and those numbers have greatly increased) have also brought about a proliferation of secondary invasive species. The high number of nutria has been associated with the invasion of muskrats and mink in the ecosystem.
rejected:
Nutria are classified as a “nuisance species” and are thought to have negative impacts on native species and natural environments.  Some of these negative impacts are: 
degrading riparian vegetation and soil by trampling through the plants and flooding the soil.
creating large pits in the banks and altering the course of riverways, which can affect the water flow, causing the banks to erode and leading to streambank collapse.
spreading exotic disease such as “mystery disease” and other mycoplasmosis.
Invasive species, including nutria, are a significant challenge to river management.

prompt: What are hybrid seeds?
chosen: An hybrid seed is a seed that came from a plant that was bred to produce desirable traits. This was mostly done by plant breeders who took two different plants, bred them together, and then saved the seeds from the resulting plants. This process was repeated until the desired plant traits were created. Sometimes plants have been bred for hybrids, like tomatoes and potatoes. In fact, hybrids are the seeds of most of the vegetables and fruits we grow.  There’s also a third kind of seed called an heirloom seed, which is just a seed from an old plant that has been passed down.
rejected: A hybrid seed is a mix of two different kinds of seeds. Hybrid seeds are grown on large farms to maximize yield and control the taste of the food.

prompt: Do you have a recipe for nachos?

What I know about making nachos:

There are basically two components: chips and cheese.  Chips are something you buy, cheese is something you make, and the process of combining them involves forming a ball with cheese, usually on top of the chips.  

To make chips, use oven-cooked, commercially-available tortilla chips and store them in a crisper. 

To make cheese, place 1 cup of evaporated milk in a pot over a high heat.  Add 3⁄4 cup of whole milk and 1⁄2 cup of heavy cream.  Bring to a simmer and then remove from heat.  Mix in 1⁄4 cup of butter, 1 cup of cheddar cheese, and a pinch of salt.  Use an immersion blender (or use a blender if you have one) to make it all smooth. 
The cheese ball is a very messy thing to make, but worth it, if you can keep all the cheese pieces intact.

Mix:

3 eggs
a large apple
a pinch of salt
a dash of white pepper
a dash of nutmeg

Heat a pan on a medium-high flame, and grease the bottom with a little butter.  Crack the eggs into the pan and gently cook them on the bottom.  While that happens, core the apple, but leave it in one piece and take a bite out of it to make a flat surface.  Once the eggs are mostly cooked, put the apple into the pan on top of them.  Sprinkle with a dash of cinnamon and a pinch of sugar, and gently turn with a spatula so the apple is covered with eggs.  Keep cooking until the eggs are fully cooked.  Flip it a few more times to ensure that it is thoroughly cooked and the apples and eggs are fully integrated.  Garnish with a sprinkle of cinnamon and a drizzle of honey.  Remove from the pan, and serve on a plate or in a bowl.

prompt: Hi, I'd like to work on my abdominal muscles. Can you recommend some exercises that are good for that, and tell me how to perform them?
chosen:
Sure, here are some great options! All of them are perfect for developing your abs, so I would recommend starting with whichever one you're most interested in, and then trying all the others too.

First up: planks. A plank is a basic exercise, and you're probably familiar with it: it's just a flat, rigid position, with the body on all fours and both elbows and toes on the ground, or very close to it. Like this:

The best way to practice it is to hold it for as long as you can. You can count seconds, or you can set a timer. Once you get good at the plank you can try doing some other versions of it, like a forearm plank, where you keep your forearms on the floor in a plank-like position, or an overhead plank, where you hold your body up on your toes.

Next up: V-ups. The V-up is a very versatile exercise and can be performed with a variety of different modifications. It's simple to perform, it's great for building your core strength, and also good for developing flexibility. Like this:

One very basic version is to do it with your hands on the floor, in a plank position. Try holding this plank up for 30 seconds, and then lowering down to the floor. Repeat this 3-5 times. Then try it with your hands on a chair, but still in a plank position. Repeat this a few times. Then try it with your hands on a higher surface, like a table, with your knees on the ground.

Other variations include performing them from a seated position, with your knees and/or feet on the floor, and it can be performed holding a variety of different items.
rejected: There are so many different exercises and approaches out there, what sort of exercises are you most interested in?  And how about training routines?  Do you want to use dumbbells or your own body weight?  Or perhaps a machine?  What will you do in a typical session?

prompt: What is the method of loci?
chosen: The method of loci is a technique for memorizing.  You first envision a place where you have a particular kind of object, and you repeat this mental image several times.  Then you remember the first letter of each object, which is the first letter of each word in the word you are memorizing.  Then you move on to a new place and do this with the second letter, and so on.  You also do this in memory, and in a different order each time.

Here’s an example:  You might be learning a new list of words that you would like to memorize, like a list of human body parts.  As you learn each new word, you’ll also make a memory of a specific scene, or “location”.  For each new word, this location will be a different physical place, like a different room in your home.  For each word you learn, you’ll remember a specific location, and you’ll also imagine that you can “travel” to that location.

Another fun thing to try is paper rosettes.  Make a circle by folding a piece of paper in half, with the long side towards you.  Then, starting on the outside edge of the circle, fold in half again, in a diagonal direction.  This gives you an “X” shape.  Now open the “X” and flatten it.  This is a rosette. prompt: How are weather forecasts made?
chosen: Weather forecasts are made with computer models. Different kinds of models have different strengths and weaknesses. One of the most commonly used models in the US is the Global Forecast System. It predicts conditions over continental-scale regions using a combination of satellite observations, data from radar and other observation sites, and other input. GFS is updated every six hours, or more often if weather patterns are changing rapidly.
rejected: We can answer that!  Most weather forecasts are generated by sophisticated computer models, which are based on physical principles such as air movement and temperature.  Each model has a large number of variables that describe the state of the weather system.  These variables include measurements of current weather conditions and observations made by a network of monitoring stations.  Based on the current state of the weather and the atmospheric conditions over a specified location, the model uses physical laws to predict the weather state and the weather system’s response to existing conditions and perturbations over a short, medium or long time frame.  In the case of extreme weather events, the model can predict the magnitude of the event and its effects on the surrounding environment and predict human deaths and physical infrastructure damage.

prompt: Great points, I didn't think of some of those. Also another issue related to climate change in regards to water global issues would be water pollution
chosen:
Ah, yes, this is related to the problems you noted.  It’s a good idea to read up on other parts of the ecosystem, too.  Here’s a bit more about water pollution:

1.  Chemical pollution: if pollutants such as waste and chemicals are in the water supply, they can affect not only drinking water, but also the health of the soil.  The plants may die, and in turn, food crops may die as well.  This can lead to an imbalance of healthy animals and plants, and in turn, humans. 
2.  Plastic pollution: plastic containers can be used to hold water, and in this way, the water itself becomes polluted.
3.  Water logging: when there is so much water that it cannot all evaporate, it is considered water logging, which can be harmful to plants and soil.  It can also cause the soil to be eroded away.  It can also cause mosquito-borne diseases.
4.  Toxic waste: for some reason, humans often dump chemical waste in water supplies, which can have harmful effects on people.  As a side effect, it can also harm aquatic life.  If there is too much of it, there can be detrimental effects on plants and animals.
rejected: Yes, those are also very common.  Have you considered writing about some examples of those issues?  For example, you could write about how climate change affects the availability of clean water.

prompt: Halloween was a few weeks ago and I'm curious, can you tell me about the origins of the Halloween holiday?
chosen: Halloween is the day before November 1st, which is the day before All Saints Day. In the past, All Saints Day was when people remembered their ancestors and showed gratitude to them. So it was a time of remembrance, when people thought about their past. Halloween was later developed as a night for kids and families to have fun. They decorated their houses, and dressed up in costumes, and went out to have fun and trick or treat for treats. These practices are fun, and are still common today. But the dark things about Halloween have developed alongside the fun. Some of these include witches, Halloween masks, ghosts, and monsters. These things might scare or distress some people, especially young children. These things are not typically seen in mainstream culture today, but it’s important to be aware that they do exist. They also happen in the context of Halloween.
rejected:
Sure, here’s a summary.  All the major western European countries celebrated some sort of version of Halloween in the fall, and a lot of it involved an emphasis on mischief and spirits.  By the 1500s, with the rise of Christianity and with a lot of people moving into cities, Halloween had become less about spirits and more about dressing up in costumes and having parties.  
The modern name for the holiday is Halloween, and this first became widely used in the United States and Ireland in the 1800s.  The day October 31 was also chosen for practical reasons - it fell on the last day of the month, so it was easy to plan things around it, and the night of October 31st was also associated with religious observances of some sort or another (also of a mischievous nature) in many areas.  When the holiday started to get exported to other countries, it became an excuse for partying and costumes were an obvious thing to associate with Halloween.  The costume emphasis has been further reinforced in recent years by the “Harry Potter” book and movie series, which was hugely popular in the late 1990s.

prompt: What is the difference between beta-blockers and ACE-inhibitors?
chosen:
Beta-blockers reduce blood pressure by blocking the beta-adrenergic receptors in the heart and arteries. They also prevent the release of adrenaline, which is one of the hormones that make blood vessels narrow. When the receptor is blocked, it prevents the adrenaline from causing the constriction of blood vessels and thus lowers blood pressure. Beta-blockers also act to stimulate the heart to beat slower and with less force, which reduces the amount of work that the heart has to do to pump the blood. They also act to increase the amount of potassium that the kidneys filter out of the bloodstream and excrete in the urine.

ACE-inhibitors prevent the production of ACE, an enzyme that constricts blood vessels, and thereby blocks the effects of adrenaline and raises the blood pressure. Unlike beta-blockers, ACE-inhibitors do not cause the heart to beat slower or produce more potassium in the urine. These drugs act by interfering with the constriction of the blood vessels and reducing the workload of the heart, thereby lowering blood pressure.
rejected:
The two main classes of medication used to treat hypertension are beta-blockers and ACE-inhibitors.

Beta-blockers are known for lowering blood pressure over time. Many people take them only once or twice a day for several months.

ACE-inhibitors are a group of drugs that treat high blood pressure. They specifically block the enzyme, or enzyme-like substance, angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE), from converting angiotensin I into angiotensin II, the hormone that raises blood pressure. The ACE-inhibitor acts by blocking the action of the ACE. This prevents the body from making angiotensin II. This is a quick-acting method of blood pressure treatment, and so ACE-inhibitors are often taken along with another class of drugs, beta-blockers, to prevent a significant increase in blood pressure.

prompt: Can you help me to understand how Howard Florey was able to first discover and use penicillin?
chosen: Oh sure, I can explain that! The first antibiotic medicines were discovered in the 1880s, when doctors noticed that people who were sick with serious infections got better when they were exposed to a mold called Penicillium chrysogenum. This was actually a coincidence; the doctors didn’t realize that this substance was related to disease, they just noticed that the person getting better was also near the mold. That was before scientists knew what microbes were, so this was the first clue to their existence. It wasn’t until the 1940s that Dr. Florey first used penicillin to treat patients. In those days, penicillin was quite difficult to make in sufficient amounts, so Dr. Florey didn’t have any interest in developing it. Then in 1943, while Dr. Florey was a prisoner of war, another scientist named Howard Walter Florey was examining another mold called Streptomyces griseus, which he had previously discovered to be related to drug-producing molds. In his experiments, he accidentally contaminated a plate of culture, but kept the petri dish anyway because he was curious what it would do. He found that the contaminated culture produced a substance that was quite useful for killing bacteria, and he sent a sample to Dr. Florey in order to find out whether they could be used to treat patients. Dr. Florey tested the substances, and found that they were effective for treating various infections.
rejected:
I can definitely explain that, but it’s going to take some time. I’m guessing that you want me to give a clear explanation of how a discovery process works, or explain exactly what happened during the discovery of penicillin, and why it wasn’t discovered earlier, and what Florey was thinking and doing at the time.

prompt: Can you explain what it means to be a Free Agent in Major League Baseball?

Sure. There are four classes of Major League Baseball free agents, based on a player’s age and experience level, so there are four groups. We can divide them into four categories:

An unrestricted free agent is someone who is not under contract with any other team.

A Type-A free agent is a player who has been on the team’s roster for at least six years and has at least 10 years of service time. They have the highest compensation rights, which means their new team has to give them at least as much in compensation as they would have had if they had been a Type-A free agent the previous year. A team can only sign one Type-A free agent, and the one they sign gets to receive the Type-A bonus. 

A Type-B free agent is a player who has been on the team’s roster for at least four years, with at least two years of service time, and is at least 26 years old and has at least three years of Major League service. Type-B free agents are still valuable players, but they don’t have the same compensation rights. A team can sign as many Type-B free agents as they want, and the free agents will share compensation,

C = P(1 + r)n

prompt: So it sounds like a movie needs multiple producers. Is that what the difference in titles means? For example, executive producer, producer, et cetera?
chosen: Yes, exactly.  There are a lot of different titles for producers, and a lot of different levels of production that are needed to make a movie.  Here are a couple examples, and their titles:  The person who raises the funds to make the movie is called the “executive producer”, or “EP”. The person who finds the actors, sets up the locations, coordinates the shooting, and keeps track of the film crew is called a “line producer”. The person who chooses the people who will be on the film crew and who makes sure they get the resources they need is called a “producer” or “unit production manager”. The person who coordinates the budgets, and manages the resources to make sure that the movie is made is called “production coordinator”.  And of course there are more people on a film crew who have to be “coordinated” and they have different titles, like the “director of photography” or “art director”.  Here are a couple more titles you may have heard of:  “film director”, “cinematographer”, “visual effects artist”, “visual effects supervisor”.
rejected: That’s right. There are multiple producers that are involved in a movie.  Sometimes the person with the most creative power is considered the “producer”.  Sometimes a producer is responsible for managing the day-to-day logistics, like making sure that everyone on the film crew gets paid on time.  Some producers are responsible for the whole movie, from beginning to end, and others work on specific parts of the movie.  Some producers have a huge role, but not necessarily a creative one, and some producers just work on a specific part of the project.  Many times, the producer is also one of the main creators of the movie, and they are considered an artist, or a director, or an actor.  But sometimes there is a producer that doesn’t have any artistic or creative role in the movie, and just is in charge of ensuring that the movie is done, and that the best decisions are being made.

Here's an example:  If I like someone, I might walk by and touch them lightly on the arm, while I make a gesture that seems natural and unrelated to anything flirtatious, like a yawn or a stretch. The woman might wonder why I touched her, what the yawn or stretch meant, and what was with the eye contact, but in this case, she'll find you very attractive. The sentence “The only possible answer is...” is a complete grammatically well formed sentence, but it is incoherent when combined with the phrase “aerobic training”.  We can interpret it in a way that makes it comprehensible, by filling in the gap. prompt: Best way to organize a clothes closet
chosen:
If you want to store clothes you've bought or borrowed for short term use, it would be easiest to just put them in a bag or box or other container, and stack them on a shelf.  You'd organize them by whatever was meaningful to you, and wouldn't need to be consistent with any official system.  But if you're trying to make your closet last a long time, or if you have a lot of clothes that you want to always find, it's important to have a system that makes them easy to find.  An appropriate system would be something like this:

* Fold shirts and pants with fold-over collars inside out.  (Remember to keep them facing the same way so you can tell which ones are right side out.)  You can fold other items as you like, but it's good to keep them symmetrical.

* Put underpants, socks, and similar things in a separate drawer or basket, since they don't take up much space and the fabrics are not suitable for hanging.  If you store them in a bag, make sure they don't overlap and you can get to them easily.

* Make sure you can easily get to the more used clothes in your closet.  If you store
